entities.name: fudge
entities.description: Fudge is the former Minister for Magic who was sacked three days ago. He mentions that the whole wizarding community has been screaming for his resignation for a fortnight.

relationships.description: Fudge was sacked by the Prime Minister three days ago, as mentioned in the conversation between them.
The Prime Minister felt pity for Fudge during their conversation, describing him as a 'shrunken-looking man'.
